directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Combine flour, soda and salt in small bowl; set aside.

Beat both sugars and Fleischmann's with electric mixer on medium-high speed until well combined. Add applesauce, Egg Beaters and vanilla; beat until well blended. Gradually stir in flour mixture just until blended. Stir in morsels.
Spray baking sheet with cooking spray. Drop batter by rounded tablespoons onto baking sheet 2 inches apart.
Bake 12 to 17 minutes or until golden brown. Cool 1 minute on cookie sheet; transfer to wire rack, cool completely. Store in covered container.
title: En-light-ened Chocolate Chip Cookies
